articles.title: R.I. college student dies of carbon monoxide poisoning while charging cellphone in car
articles.description:
Joseph Boutros, 21, was charging his cellphone inside an idling vehicle that had its exhaust pipe embedded in the snow, Newport police said.

The post R.I. college student dies of carbon monoxide poisoning while charging cellphone in car appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Joseph Boutros, 21, died from carbon monoxide poisoning in Newport, R.I.
The incident occurred while he charged his cellphone in an idling car.
Residents are reminded of the dangers of carbon monoxide, especially in winter.

articles.title: Mass. hiker suffering medical emergency rescued from White Mountains
articles.description:
Authorities say the 75-year-old of Acton was assisted down the trail and then transported by snowmobile to an awaiting ambulance.

The post Mass. hiker suffering medical emergency rescued from White Mountains appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Authorities rescued a 75-year-old hiker from Acton during a medical emergency in the White Mountains.
The hiker was transported by snowmobile to an awaiting ambulance for further medical assistance.
This incident highlights the importance of safety measures for Boston residents hiking in remote areas.

articles.title: Man arrested for allegedly throwing dog off balcony while drunk in Milford
articles.description:
Police said the small dog was found severely injured in a snowbank outside an apartment complex.

The post Man arrested for allegedly throwing dog off balcony while drunk in Milford appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Man arrested for allegedly throwing dog off balcony in Milford on February 24.
Dog found severely injured in a snowbank outside an apartment complex.
Incident raises concerns about animal safety and responsible pet ownership in local communities.

articles.title: 5 takeaways from Eliot Wolf’s press conference at the NFL Scouting Combine
articles.description:
Wolf touched on a variety of subjects as the Patriots kick off their offseason.

summary: Eliot Wolf discussed offseason strategies for the Patriots at the NFL Scouting Combine.

Patriots' decisions could significantly affect local fan engagement and team performance this season.

articles.title: Boston would likely have been next up to host the 2028 Olympics. In Italy, Marty Walsh reflects on what could have been.
articles.description:
"If we had an Olympics, the center of Boston would be the focus of the Olympic Games."

The post Boston would likely have been next up to host the 2028 Olympics. In Italy, Marty Walsh reflects on what could have been. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Marty Walsh reflects on Boston's potential to host the 2028 Olympics.
Boston was likely next in line for the Olympic Games after Italy.
Hosting the Olympics would have centered activities in downtown Boston.

articles.title: Mass. girl, 11, killed in Utah avalanche while vacationing with family
articles.description:
Madelyn Eitas, of Rochester, died in an avalanche last Thursday outside Salt Lake City.

The post Mass. girl, 11, killed in Utah avalanche while vacationing with family appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Massachusetts girl Madelyn Eitas, 11, died in an avalanche in Utah on February 23.
Eitas was vacationing with her family near Salt Lake City during the tragic incident.
This incident highlights the dangers of winter sports for families traveling from Boston.

articles.title: Dorchester women injured after snowmobile hits multiple trees in N.H.
articles.description:
Officials say the accident occurred near Fish Pond in Columbia and involved a first-time snowmobile operator.

The post Dorchester women injured after snowmobile hits multiple trees in N.H. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Two Dorchester women were injured in a snowmobile accident in New Hampshire.
The incident occurred near Fish Pond in Columbia involving a first-time operator.
Local authorities emphasize the importance of safety training for snowmobile operators.

articles.title: Frederick Wiseman, the Bostonian who changed filmmaking forever
articles.description:
3 Frederick Wiseman movies to watch in honor of the legendary director.

summary: Frederick Wiseman, a Boston native, revolutionized documentary filmmaking with his unique style.
Three notable films by Wiseman are recommended for local audiences to explore his impact.
Wiseman's work continues to influence Boston's cultural scene and inspire local filmmakers.

articles.title: Layoffs hit Boston Metal as company plans Woburn shutdown
articles.description:
The climate-friendly steel startup will cut 71 positions beginning March 14.

The post Layoffs hit Boston Metal as company plans Woburn shutdown appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston Metal will shut down its Woburn facility, impacting local employment.
The company will lay off 71 employees starting March 14, 2026.
This closure may affect the local economy and job market in Woburn.
